message.content: {"id": "50793", "title": "Bug 50793: Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch", "description": "Bug 50793: When a ServletRequestListener is defined, the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST rather than ASYNC after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch().", "OB": "The expected behavior is for the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest to be ASYNC after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch().", "EB": "The actual behavior is that the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch().", "SR": "To resolve this issue, the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch() should be corrected to ASYNC."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '50793', 'title': 'Bug 50793Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch', 'description': 'Bug 50793Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch ', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'If a ServletRequestListener is defined, when is invoked after a call to AsyncContextdispatch() the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST rather than ASYNC. '}
